short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get one random law from the popular 48 Laws of Power book - the definitive manual for anyone interested in gaining ultimate control.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Random48LawsOfPower is a Chrome new tab extension that shows a random law from the popular 48 Laws of Power Book by Robert Greene
